pyampp.util.config
==================

.. py:module:: pyampp.util.config


Attributes
----------

.. autoapisummary::

   pyampp.util.config.AIA_EUV_PASSBANDS
   pyampp.util.config.AIA_UV_PASSBANDS
   pyampp.util.config.JSOC_NOTIFY_EMAIL
   pyampp.util.config.HMI_B_SEGMENTS
   pyampp.util.config.HMI_B_PRODUCTS


Functions
---------

.. autoapisummary::

   pyampp.util.config.get_base_directory
   pyampp.util.config.setup_directories
   pyampp.util.config.aia_euv_passbands
   pyampp.util.config.aia_uv_passbands
   pyampp.util.config.hmi_b_segments
   pyampp.util.config.jsoc_notify_email
   pyampp.util.config.hmi_b_products


Module Contents
---------------

.. py:function:: get_base_directory()

   Get the base directory depending on the OS.


.. py:function:: setup_directories()

   Create and return the necessary directories for the package.


.. py:function:: aia_euv_passbands()

   Return the passbands for the SDO/AIA instrument.


.. py:function:: aia_uv_passbands()

   Return the passbands for the SDO/AIA instrument.


.. py:function:: hmi_b_segments()

   Return the segments for the HMI magnetogram.


.. py:function:: jsoc_notify_email()

   Return the email address for JSOC notifications.


.. py:function:: hmi_b_products()

   Return the products for the HMI magnetogram.


.. py:data:: AIA_EUV_PASSBANDS
   :value: ['94', '131', '171', '193', '211', '304', '335']


.. py:data:: AIA_UV_PASSBANDS
   :value: ['1600', '1700']


.. py:data:: JSOC_NOTIFY_EMAIL

.. py:data:: HMI_B_SEGMENTS
   :value: ['field', 'inclination', 'azimuth', 'disambig']


.. py:data:: HMI_B_PRODUCTS
   :value: ['br', 'bp', 'bt']
